mainText:
Although it is a very different industry, as a biologist and chemist, Steve inspired me to never settle for anything less than the absolute best. Apple helped me throughout college to keep in touch with my family and to feel at home no matter where I was in the world. Without Steve's innovation, as well as everyone at Apple, the industry would not be what it is today. Thank you Steve, for everything. 

Stay hungry, stay foolish.
author: Nate
